dl.dd: Type: one of the values below
This attribute indicates which element to the left or above the template.XULElem("splitter") should be resized when the splitter is repositioned.
The element immediately to the left or above the splitter resizes.
The element that is the farthest away from the splitter to the left or above the splitter resizes.
The closest flexible element resizes. template.Fx_minversion_inline(3)
